ta.title: இங்கே அவர்கள் இருக்கும் இடங்கள் உள்ளன
body_lines: இந்த அறிக்கை வடக்கு, வட மத்திய மற்றும் கிழக்கு மாகாணங்களில் உள்ள சூடான குறியீடுகளை சித்தரிக்கிறது, இது "குருணேகலா மற்றும் மொனெராகலா மாவட்டங்களின் அரவணைப்புக்கு அதிக கவனம் செலுத்துகிறது.

එමෙන්ම බස්නාහිර, සබරගමුව සහ දකුණු පළාත්වලත් පුත්තලම සහ මාතලේ දිස්ත්‍රික්කවලත් ඇතැම් ස්ථානවල උණුසුම් දර්ශකය "අවධානය" යොමුකළයුතු මට්ටමක පවතී යැයි අපේක්ෂා කරන බවද කාලගුණවිද්‍යා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව නිවේදනය කළේය.

en.title: Here are the places where they are
body_lines: The Department of Meteorology was released today (05).
The statement depicts the warm indexes in the Northern, North Central and Eastern provinces, that is a "more attention to the warmth of the Kurunegala and Moneragala districts.
The Meteorology Department announced the "attention" in some places in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and Southern provinces and in the Puttalam and Matale Districts.

summary_lines: The Meteorology Department highlighted warmer conditions in Northern, North Central, and Eastern provinces, with special attention to Kurunegala and Moneragala districts. It also noted warmer conditions in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Southern provinces, and Puttalam and Matale districts.
